graphql.query:
{
  medicationList {
    id
    name
    quantity
    companyName
    description
    medicationGuide
    medicationType
    notion
    isFreeBuy
    isFinedMedication
  }
}

mutation {
  createMedication(medicationInfo: {
    name: "12412412"
    quantity: 123
    companyName: "Cong ty Duoc Pham AC"
    description: "214124"
    medicationGuide: "124124"
    medicationType: "Thuốc an thần"
    notion: "Test Med notion"
    isFreeBuy: true
    isFinedMedication: false
    createdById: 2
  }) {
    ok
    medication{
      
      name
      quantity
      description
      companyName
      medicationGuide
      medicationType
      createdBy
      isFreeBuy
      isFinedMedication
  }
    message
  }
}

mutation {
  editMedication (medicationId: 2000,  medicationInfo: {
    name: "Edited first patient"
    quantity: 999
    companyName: "New SSID"
    description: "Edited description"
    medicationGuide: "Edited medication Guide"
    medicationType: "Edited medication type"
    notion: "edited notion"
    isFreeBuy: false
    isFinedMedication: true
  }) {
    ok
    medication{
   		name
      quantity
      companyName
      description
      medicationGuide
      medicationType
      notion
      isFreeBuy
      isFinedMedication
  }
    message
  }
}

query {
  medicationDetail(id: 2000) {
    id
    name
    quantity
    companyName
    description
    medicationGuide
    medicationType
    notion
    isFreeBuy
    isFinedMedication
  }
}
